**Supreme Petition of the Three Caverns**

**Scripture Title:** *Supreme Petition of the Three Caverns*
Three fascicles.
Source text: *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, Cavern Spirit Section, Petitions and Memorials category.

**Fascicle One of the Supreme Petition of the Three Caverns**

**Vermilion Memorial for Universal Salvation and Deliverance from Suffering**

Your humble servant, [Name], of lowly rank, with utmost reverence and trepidation, prostrates and bows twice, respectfully addressing the throne:

This unworthy servant, a speck of dust and blade of grass, by mere fortune of past blessings, has been graced with favor and light, granted registers and promotions, transmitted scriptures and received the Dao. Yet I remain dull and ignorant, my faults deep as abysses, my merits lighter than a mustard seed. Though I have humbly received nurturance, I have not been punished for my transgressions. To repay the grace of salvation and deliver beings, I dare not presume.

Your servant respectfully submits the intent of this retreat.

I deeply fear that in the netherworld’s winding paths, the Three Offices and Nine Bureaus, the Iron Enclosure and the Unrelenting Prison, beneath layers of darkness and dense gloom, the souls of the condemned languish, bound for eternity without release. If they do not return their spirits to the Azure Ultimate and petition the Azure Radiance, invoking universal compassion, how shall they escape? Only by approaching the Mysterious Threshold at dawn to receive refinement and rebirth may this be achieved. Thus, I, foolish though I am, humbly present this memorial to ascend to the Azure Palace, beseeching the power of wisdom and mercy, the might of the divine to bestow grace. May the wondrous *qi* of the Azure Mystery, the radiance of a hundred treasures, pierce the dense gloom, illuminate the endless night, and shine without fail across heaven above and heaven below. May the departed soul [Name] transcend the dark abyss, realize the wondrous emptiness of the void, have sins absolved and transgressions pardoned, and ascend to the Golden Towers.

Your servant respectfully invokes the Azure Mystery’s Youths of Salvation, Jade Maidens of Salvation, and the Envoys of the Nine-Dragon Talismanic Command, to ascend to the Palace of Everlasting Joy in the Eastern Ultimate. At the Jade Steps, may they request the descent of the Nine-Dragon Talismanic Command of the Eastern Florescence, proclaiming it to the boundless divine realms of the ten directions, the shadowy paths and hidden passes, and all places of punishment and confinement. For the departed [Name], may they swiftly expunge the ledgers of sin, eradicate the roots of evil, and guard body and soul, granting immediate liberation.

Furthermore, your servant invokes the Azure Mystery’s Divine Officers of the Yellow Register for Prison-Breaking, the Wardens of Prison-Breaking, the Talisman-Bearing Divine Officers, and the Flying Dragon Couriers of the Talismanic Command, to descend as one. May they issue decrees to shatter the netherworld’s dungeons, command the underworld’s officials, and cause the flames of the Fire Mountain to subside, the waves of the Ice Pool to still, the sword trees to transform into blossoming groves, and the blade forests into jade trees. May the hells crumble, the iron cities open, and the departed spirits be released from torment, drawn to the altar’s steps to behold the light.

Furthermore, your servant invokes the Celestial Officers of the True Light of the Great Unity to Guide Souls, the Divine Officers of the Three *Qi* of Red Light to Transform Souls, the Envoys to Seek Souls across the Six Paths, the Judges of the Night-Shining Summons, and the Swift Flying Cloud Divine Officers, to descend as one. May they pursue and retrieve the true soul and correct spirit of the departed [Name], returning them to the yang realm, where they may bathe, change garments, pay homage to the perfected, and receive sustenance.

Furthermore, your servant invokes the True Bureau of Refinement and Salvation of the Southern Prosperity Palace of the Vermilion Mound Fire Treasury, the Jade Maidens and Youths of the Yellow Florescence, and the Generals of Water and Fire, to descend as one. May they specially refine and purge the departed [Name], scouring away worldly filth, tempering karmic miasmas, illuminating within and without, and purifying body and spirit.

Furthermore, your servant invokes the Jade Maidens of Harmonious Mystery and Numinous Radiance, the Divine Officers of Left and Right Upholding Rectitude, the Flying Cloud Officers of Soul-Recording and Merit-Registering, the Jade Clarity Inspectors of Talismanic Verification, and the Flying Cloud Divine Officers of Transcendent Travel and Register-Shifting, to descend as one. May they specially examine and oversee the departed [Name], ensuring just assessment, recommending rebirth, recording meritorious deeds, guiding the soul to transcendence, excising their name from the ghostly registers, and inscribing it in the celestial bureaus, that they may forever dwell as a seed of immortality, free from further cycles.

Furthermore, your servant invokes the Celestial Officers of the Free and Joyous Wandering Souls, the Divine Officers of the Mysterious Salvation of the Crooked and Perverse, the Jade Maidens of Merit and Achievement, and the Great Gods of the Registry, to lead the departed [Name] to ascend to the Palace of the Mysterious Life of the Great Unity. May they pay homage at the Lotus Throne, wander and feast in wondrous splendor, their bodies suffused with jade light, their clothing and nourishment self-sustaining. May auspicious mists dispel death, and propitious clouds usher forth life.

May the Five Sufferings and Three Paths all realize the fruit of non-action; may the Four Births and Six Destinies swiftly transcend the realm of defilement.

May the blessings of earth and heaven universally bestow their benefits, and may Your boundless compassion deign to regard our earnest plea.

Your humble servant respectfully invokes the Azure Mystery Jade Maidens, the Azure Mystery Merit Officers, the Four Direct Jade Script Officers, the Divine Assembly Officers of the Dao, and the Flying Celestial Envoys of the Ten Directions—each to attend in their singular authority.

On behalf of [Name], your servant humbly presents a vermilion memorial of salvation to the Heavenly Gate of the Eastern Culmen. May the celestial grace respond in kind. With reverence and awe, your servant bows his head to the ground, prostrates himself, and respectfully submits this entreaty.

Your servant, [Your Name], of [Your Prefecture, County, and Abbey], presently engaged in the purification rites at the Palace of Everlasting Joy within the Heavenly Center of the Eastern Culmen, addresses the Most Merciful and Compassionate, the Ever-Responsive, the Great Unity Savior from Suffering, the Jade August One.

In the [Year] of the Great Year Star, on the [Day] of the [Month], at [Location], your servant, with utmost reverence, prostrates himself and submits this Eastern Culmen Memorial.

This month, on the [Day], for the pious disciple [Name] who has established the Azure Mystery Wondrous Fast of Salvation from Suffering for [Number] days and nights, to deliver the soul of the departed [Name], your servant respectfully presents this memorial.

It is humbly observed that when the Vermilion Radiance unfolded the cosmic chart, the loving sun circulated through the Six Directions; when the Azure Mystery governed the turning of the ages, auspicious mists flourished in the Nine Netherworlds. The luminous white jade light shines forth, and the resplendent purple-golden form illumines all. Ever-responsive to cries for aid, ever-compassionate to those who invoke, Your boundless deliverance knows no limit, and thus we turn in devotion and make our plea.

With reverence and awe, your servant bows his head to the ground, reflecting upon the soul of the departed [Name], lingering in the snares of the worldly net, traversing the mechanisms of dust. In the thousand-fathom sea of desire, they drift upon wild waves; in the ten-thousand-ren river of attachment, they cannot escape the surging currents. Their spirit drowned in a single moment, their steps sank into the ninefold night. The copper gates clang shut, the iron ramparts enclose all around. In silent sorrow, they vainly long for a path to life; in frantic anguish, they suddenly realize there is no gate to salvation from death. Had they not turned their lives toward the Azure Flower, how could their souls ascend beyond the Yellow Turbidity?

We reverently invoke the Heavenly Center of the Eastern Culmen, the Palace of Everlasting Joy, the Most Merciful and Compassionate, the Ever-Responsive, the Great Unity Savior from Suffering, the Jade August One. Your majestic power pervades all, Your wisdom and strength encompass the universe. In the seven-jeweled forest of towering trees, You pour forth the radiant sweet dew; upon the nine-hued lotus throne, You spread the resplendent clouds of compassion. Your true light blankets the great thousand worlds, and Your auspicious qi unfurls across the hundred millions. All who dwell within Your transforming influence are surely uplifted and guided.

May Your sagely virtue shine forth, and Your divine might surge boundlessly. Command the immortal officers of the Nine Bureaus to govern the earth and uphold the celestial decrees; proclaim the true officers of the Two Courts to manifest the Dao and magnify the heavenly principles. Record their merits upon the cinnabar tablets, and instantly dissolve their karmic obstructions from the mysterious registers. Thus may the soul of the departed [Name], swiftly mounting the dawn, hastily depart the night. May they forever escape the scorching agonies of hell and sever all ties to the Dark Feng; may they enjoy the pure bliss of heaven and swiftly ascend the Vermilion Fire. May their steps swiftly ascend to the wondrous existence, and may their form and spirit swiftly realize the realm of emptiness.

Your servant’s heart is overwhelmed with fervent devotion. Respectfully presenting this memorial, he submits it with utmost sincerity.

On the [Day] of the [Month] of the [Year], your servant [Your Name], prostrating himself, respectfully submits this memorial.

Again, your servant [Your Name] bows in reverence.

To the Throne,

On the [Day] of this month, your disciple [Name], in reverence, has conducted the Mystic Fast of Salvation under the Azure Mystery for several days and nights, to deliver the departed soul of [Name]. With this memorial, your servant humbly submits his report.

We reflect that when the Azure Mystery opens its court, propitious clouds ascend with the radiance of the Three Poles; when the Yellow Register establishes its palace, flying mists scatter their hues to the eight directions. The sun of wisdom shines forth from the Lion’s Throne, and the divine wind blazes in the Dragon’s script. Thus, clutching this vermilion petition, I raise this plain silk in supplication.

Your servant, trembling with awe, bows his head and knocks his forehead to the ground, mindful of his fortune to ride this luminous destiny and partake in this flourishing era. Upholding the Dao and enacting heaven’s decrees, he follows in the footsteps of the exalted; receiving the mandate and proclaiming virtue, he clasps the lotus throne to attend upon your countenance. Having received the grace of nurture, how dare he not repay the blessings of cultivation?

Reverently considering the Most Compassionate One of the Eastern Pole, within the Palace of Eternal Joy—the Supreme Unity, Savior from Suffering, Heavenly Worthy of Jade Majesty—who sits in sublime majesty, eternally serene. Responding to thoughts with mercy, he scatters auspicious mist at the gates of death; answering cries with compassion, he showers sweet dew upon the portals of life. Universally, he delivers those sunk in darkness, all drawn to his salvific guidance.

May the departed soul swiftly depart the night and hasten into the dawn; may the dark gloom be erased from the registers, dissolving the illusory shadows of the great chiliocosm; may the Azure Florescence fix their name in the ledgers, and may they ride the true light of the Supreme Unity. Forever may they attend the Purple Gold, ascending to the heights of Jasper Jade.

Your servant’s heart is overwhelmed with fervent devotion. Respectfully presenting this memorial, he submits it with utmost sincerity.

On the [Day] of the [Month] of the [Year], your servant [Your Name], prostrating himself, respectfully submits this *Memorial for Breaking the Prisons of Hell*.

Again, your servant [Your Name] bows in reverence.

To the August Jade Sovereign,

On the [Day] of this month, your disciple [Name], in devotion, has established the Mystic Fast of Azure Florescence and Salvific Grace, spanning several days and nights, to deliver the departed soul of [Name], now invoking the ritual forms to break the prisons of hell and summon the wandering spirit.

Your servant prostrates himself, reflecting: as one ascends to the true and delivers the destined, the Azure Florescence congeals the limpid dew; as shackles are shattered and gates flung wide, auspicious mists disperse through the gloom. Daring to knock upon the sacred portal of compassion, I implore the spreading of salvific mercy. With a hundred bows I lay bare my plea, with a single heart I beseech your decree.

Truly trembling in awe, I kowtow and prostrate myself, deeply concerned that in the frigid courts the lingering souls stagnate, in the abyssal ravines the forsaken spirits languish. Iron ramparts encircle them, enduring ten thousand kalpas of fettered suffering; copper gates blaze with radiance, bearing a thousand ages of carceral severity. Ghostly officials enforce the laws of yin and yang; netherworld clerks administer punishments of water and fire. Without your edict to break these bonds, how may they ascend and transcend?

Reverently considering the Heavenly Center of the Eastern Ultimate, within the Palace of Eternal Joy, the Greatly Compassionate One, the Supreme Unity Salvific and Suffering-Relieving Heavenly Worthy, August Jade Sovereign—ever responsive to cries, ever aiding with creation—you descend your majestic radiance upon the myriad treasures, parting the layered darkness; you wield the divine staff of the Five Numinous Ones, piercing the accumulated night. May you deign to incline your profound hearing, resplendently bestow your assent, proclaiming the decree in accord with the statutes, secretly aligning with the dragon tally to usher in the dawn; may you, following the rites, shatter the prisons, instantly bringing spring to the kennels of suffering.

Thus may the departed soul of [Name] depart the night without sorrow, ride the dawn with joy. As their luminous splendor blazes forth, the ninefold ramparts gleam bright; as their spirit flies with the sacred staff, the three paths know peace and prosperity. May all in the realms of suffering be uplifted together, attaining the land of bliss.

Your servant’s heart is overwhelmed with fervent devotion. Respectfully presenting this memorial, he submits it with utmost sincerity.

On the [Day] of the [Month] of the [Year], your servant [Your Name], prostrating himself, respectfully submits this *Memorial of Merit for the Azure Florescence*.

Again, your servant [Your Name] bows in reverence.

To the August Jade Sovereign,

On the [Day] of this month, your disciple [Name], at [Location], has established the Mystic Fast of Azure Florescence and Salvific Grace, spanning several days and nights, to deliver the departed soul of [Name]. Now, with the altar rites concluded and transgressions atoned, this memorial is presented to report the merit to the divine officials, lords, generals, and clerks.

Your servant prostrates himself, reflecting: as the Azure Florescence governs the celestial motions, it scatters the dew of wisdom to flow and nourish; as the Yellow Register unfurls its charts, it illumines the clouds of fortune to fly and sprinkle.

The golden tablets reveal the dragon talismans’ secrets,
The jade charts unfold the phoenix scriptures’ marvels.
The Three Realms restore life,
The Nine Heavens raise the dead.
Bearing radiance to succor the lowly, truly repaying grace;
Overflowing from within, earnestly bowing in repentance.
Humbly imploring Your profound silence,
To bestow pardon with boundless mercy.

Your servant, trembling with awe, kowtows and prostrates himself.
Reflecting upon his own path: a minnow in the rut, a toad in the well—
meager talent, shallow understanding.
Failing to uphold the Azure Precepts,
merely assisting in the Mystic Ranks.
Unversed in the rites of reverence,
his demeanor often transgresses;
still ignorant of the fast’s canons,
he lightly violates the prohibitions.
Presumptuously summoning the divine bureaus,
recklessly filing memorials under his superior’s title.
Words disordered, yet daring to expound the golden codes;
thoughts scattered, yet rashly inscribing jade talismans.
His conduct already marked by error,
he fears his faults and transgressions accumulate.
Earnestly hoping for compassion,
that all may be forgiven with grace.

Reverently considering the August Jade Sovereign of the Eastern Ultimate Azure Florescence,
the Most High Lord of Salvation and Suffering:
Your Dao embraces the Three Realms,
Your virtue surpasses the Ten Splendors.
Upholding the true spirits,
You reward merit with justice;
sustaining the duties of office,
You conceal faults with forbearance.

At the outset of this fast’s observance,
we reverently summon:
the celestial immortals’ warrior-officers,
the terrestrial immortals’ mounted hosts,
the Perfected Ones’ cavalry,
the divine beings’ legions,
the sun, moon, and stellar constellations’ troops,
the Three Rivers and Four Seas’ forces,
the Nine Palaces and Five Thearchs’ battalions,
the thirty-two heavens’ overseers of the fast’s rites,
the jade lads attending incense,
the jade maidens scattering blossoms,
the left and right envoys of the Three-and-Five Merit Registrars,
the incense-officials of the Five Thearchs’ daily and hourly watches,
the flying-dragon riders and numinous-treasure celestial immortals,
the jade maidens of the inner courts of all heavens who receive offerings,
the merit-recording envoys of the Dao’s spiritual assemblies,
the left and right immortal officers of the Azure Florescence and Yellow Registers’ true bureaus,
the immortal generals and officers of the Nine Heavens’ Universal Salvation Court,
the departments of the Dark Altar’s Opening Salvation and Primordial Unity,
the Knot-Unbinding Bureau,
the Life-Monitoring Bureau,
the Celestial Physicians’ Bureau,
the Purification Bureau,
the Headgear-and-Case Bureau,
the Transformation-Summoning Bureau,
and all their subordinate heralding officers;
the officers and immortals of this sanctuary’s attendant retinue,
the jade lads and jade maidens,
the principal and deputy officers, generals, and protectors of the Dao,
the inspectors and overseers of the altar,
the officials, lords, generals, and officers of all provincial courts and departments who fulfill their duties and labor in service;
the guardian spirits of this temple,
the city gods of this prefecture and this county,
the true officers of this village and this hamlet’s domain,
the earth gods and principal spirits,
the talisman-envoys of the Three Realms,
the Four Watches’ merit registrars,
the fast’s household earth god and Controller of Destiny,
and the Six Spirits—
all stand at their posts in the altar’s precincts,
each diligent in their toil,
each arrayed in solemn and resplendent vesture.
Accompanying the memorial we now present,
they ascend to the Dark Capital,
there to receive their due merit and reward.

How dare we fail to inscribe this upon our hearts,
to refine ourselves with earnest devotion,
to strive that we may not betray the gifts of our creation,
and to expand the nurturing power of transformation?

May we align with the primordial accord of the Dao,
and so achieve the radiant harmony of the Eastern Florescence;
may we lead the teaching and study of the true,
and so assist the alchemical transformations of the Southern Cinnabar.

With utmost reverence and overwhelming gratitude, I humbly present this memorial to make known these words.

**Memorial for the Water and Fire Refinement**

The unworthy official, [Name], prostrates and declares:
On the ___ day of this month, for the disciple [Name] of the fast’s law, who has reverently established a fast of ___ days and nights to deliver the departed soul of [Name] and ascend them to the immortal realms, we now request the descent of water and fire for refinement.

I, your servant, prostrate and reflect: Heaven and Earth are fixed in their positions, spreading the ancestral qi to illumine the turning cycles; Fire and Water divide their essences, exhausting their numinous power to nurture all things. The Five Scripts unfold in vastness, the myriad beings are shaped in perfection—desiring to bestow the divine radiance of the Nine Refinements, we rely wholly upon the sacred workings of the Two Modes.

With awe and trepidation, I bow my head and knock my forehead, deeply concerned that the departed soul of [Name], bound by karmic dust and ingrained habits, is enmeshed in the coils of karmic filth. The root of life in the Nine Qi may seek to return to its origin, yet the stem of death in the Five Forms remains severed from the Void. Without the refining crucible to ascend on high, how may they transcend and rise directly?

The moon’s vessel gleams with radiance, drawing the golden essence of the Eastern Well; the solar mirror gathers its rays, pouring forth the vermilion fire of the Southern Cinnabar. Without the aid of such reflection, who shall assist in their manifestation?

I reverently consider the Most High, formless and nameless, the Void and Spontaneous, the Perfect and Great Dao, the Supreme and Primordial Honored One, Sovereign of the Golden Towers and Jade Palaces. Your Dao parallels Yin and Yang, your virtue encompasses all that is borne and covered. May you deign to issue your sacred command, sending down the luminous essence of the Five Dragons; may you dispatch the divine perfected, spreading the transformative power of the Nine Phoenixes’ resplendent harmony. Thus may the departed be restored from their bones and raised from death, and through the oversight of the true, be delivered to life.

Nine traversals complete the person, as qi upon qi returns to the marvel of the living spirit; ten cycles refine the being, as spirit upon spirit reveals the mystery of qi’s flow. Departing the night to face the origin, they ride the dawn and mount the light.

With utmost urgency and longing for your grace, I humbly present this memorial to make known my plea.

I, your servant, with awe and trepidation, bow my head and knock my forehead, reverently submitting these words.

Year ___ Month ___ Day

**Memorial to the Great Dao**

The unworthy official, [Name], prostrates and declares:
On the ___ day of this month, on behalf of the disciple [Name] of the fast, who has reverently established a fast of ___ days and nights to deliver the departed soul of [Name], I now present this memorial to make known these words.

I, your servant, prostrate and reflect: Knocking upon the Nine Gates to serve with clarity, clouds gather in the Pure and Subtle; ascending the Eight Stairs to offer praise, winds are pure in the Dark and Mysterious. Seeking the impartial wisdom of the Three Ultimates, we receive the encompassing grace of the Ten Flowers. Rain and dew suffuse, sun and stars shine brightly—daring to take refuge in the Maple’s Lord, I pour forth the devotion of the sunflower’s heart. Earnestly I hope for your lofty brilliance to cast its illuminating gaze.

I, your servant, with awe and trepidation, bow my head and knock my forehead, deeply mindful that the departed soul of [Name], woven with the threads of grievance and warped in nature, is ensnared by the net of sin. The Three Delusions remain unremoved, casting them into confusion and inversion upon the lost path; the Four Bonds are unguarded, driving them to wander the crooked ways in circles. The flower of sin accumulates for ages in the Northern Feng, the leaves of transgression pile high in the records of the Eastern Tai. In the vast and desolate night abyss, the terror of water and fire strikes the heart; in the silent and cold courtyard, the sight of Yin and Yang shatters the courage. Thus we reverently establish repentance and offer this fast.

Without the boundless ocean of the Supreme Sage, how could the foolish below be nurtured in the spring of renewal?

I reverently consider the Most High, formless and nameless, the Void and Spontaneous, the Perfect and Great Dao, the Supreme and Primordial Honored One, Sovereign of the Golden Towers and Jade Palaces. Your majesty is beyond measure, your vastness defies description. Condensing wondrous being to bestow essence, you transform and spread across the Nine Lands; conceiving the Void to nurture purity, your governance pervades the Three Heavens. You manifest compassion for the suffering and sorrowful, broadly bestowing the grace of mercy.

May your numinous light banish the night, may the ancestral qi flourish eternally. Command the Dark Bureaus to erase the records of grievance; summon the Cinnabar Bureau to dissolve the registers of transgression. May the departed soul of [Name] depart the night in joy and ride the dawn in delight. May they transcend the Three Realms, free from the sorrow of confinement or oppression; may they be commanded to traverse the Nine Gates, blessed with the joy of escort and welcome.

How dare I not look up to the transforming sun, striving to propagate the Dao’s wind? Ascending the azure jade to lay bare my heart, I endeavor to receive the phoenix’s grace; gazing upon the purple gold to bow in homage, I forever bathe in the dragon’s favor.

With utmost urgency and overwhelming emotion, I humbly present this memorial to make known my plea.

I, your servant, with awe and trepidation, bow my head and knock my forehead, reverently submitting these words.

**Memorial for the Blood Lake**

The unworthy official, [Name], prostrates...

Memorial now submitted: On the ___ day of this month, for the patron ___ who has reverently established a fast of ___ days and nights, I have performed rites to deliver the departed soul of ___, that they may ascend to the immortal realms. It is observed that this person perished in childbirth, their form and spirit defiled by foulness, and only through the sagely creation may this be thoroughly purged. May their qi and appearance be made whole, their protective and nourishing forces restored.

I, your servant, prostrate myself and reflect: the great virtue of ceaseless generation has long been revered for its benevolence bestowed below; with utmost care and humility, I now lay bare the sincerity of my plea. May the dark and oppressive be lifted from earthly confinement, and the mysterious and void be graced with celestial light. With reverence, I bow twice to present my petition and offer my wholehearted entreaty.

I, your servant, with awe and trepidation, bow my head and knock my forehead, reflecting thus: by fortunate karmic affinity, I have encountered this flourishing era. To propagate the Dao and emulate Heaven, I have nearly fulfilled my duty in the dragon’s presence; to receive and proclaim virtue, I have sworn to disseminate boundless felicity. Yet I deeply consider the departed soul of ___, who, entrusted to the female condition, sought to navigate the truths of existence. Ensnared within the web of attachment, she lost the way of earth and wood; entangled in worldly mechanisms, she sullied the purity of gold and blossoms. For nine nights, she sank in the sea of suffering; in a single moment, she drowned in the Blood Lake. The jailers wielded their authority, turning in an instant to test her in the trials of yin and yang; the underworld officials displayed their might, startling her heart with the fetters of water and fire. Without the vast grace of imperial favor, how could she ascend to the transformations of yang?

I reverently contemplate the Most High, formless and nameless, the void and spontaneous, the Perfect and Great Dao, the Supreme and Primordial Honored One, Sovereign of the Golden Portal and Jade Palace. The Dao encompasses all in its embrace, and virtue harmonizes the hidden and the manifest. The benevolent wind stirs the eight distant realms, and all spirits rejoice; the transformative rain nourishes the nine layers, and countless souls beam with joy. May You look upon my earnest plea with favor and grant me the abundant blessings of Your grace.

I humbly pray that You may issue the crane’s pardon and bestow the phoenix’s decree. May the three qi radiate their light, offering hope at dawn’s first glow; may the ten flowers illuminate the darkness, dispelling the gloom of night. Thus may the departed soul of ___ be cleansed of filth, her body and spirit filled with joy. Crossing the Crimson Mound, may she have her fate delivered and ten thousand sins dissolved in purity; may her name be erased from the Black Register, and a thousand grievances scattered in harmony. May her spirit be as jade in its purity, her steps light as spring’s warmth.

With utmost urgency and overwhelming emotion, I humbly present this memorial to make known my plea. I, your servant, with awe and trepidation, bow my head and knock my forehead, reverently submitting these words.

Memorial for the Six Canopies
Memorial to the Mysterious Master
The unworthy official, [Name], bows twice.

This memorial respectfully reports: On the ___ day of this month, for the ritual disciple ____, a grand ___-day fast has been established to deliver the departed soul of ____, humbly beseeching the celestial grace to enable her rebirth in the realm of the living. Further, for the matter of ____, we implore the celestial grace to bestow protection and peace. Tonight, we commence the fast and make this announcement.

I, your servant, prostrate myself, reflecting that the teachings emerged from the Primordial Azure, illuminating the five kalpas with divine radiance; the Dao spread across the Azure Heavens, streaming the ancestral qi to the eight directions. Who upholds the sanctity of the fast’s precepts if not the exalted authority of the master’s abode? Daring to rely upon sacred ordinance, I humbly lay bare my foolish sincerity.

With awe and trepidation, I bow my head and knock my forehead.

I recall that I, your servant, am blessed with felicitous foundations and born in an age of prosperity. Yet in the subtle interplay of yin and yang, I merely mingle with the luminaries of the eastern isles; in the fusion of warp and weft of the mysterious, I cannot fathom the truths of the western precincts. Presumptuously presiding over the jade altar to make offerings, I tremble at the thought of inscribing the jade tablets. I rely entirely upon your lofty wisdom to graciously extend your guiding hand.

Before the sacred presence of the Great Master of the Mysterious Realm, the Perfected Lord:

Endowed with essence and subtle marvels, nurtured in the purity of the Great Void, you govern the Ten Radiant Realms, spreading the divine wind to nurture all; you preside over the Three Caverns, streaming the sun of wisdom to bring forth creation. May you, in your profound compassion, deign to descend in your swift chariot. Issue decrees and establish commands, that I may assist in the celestial order; propagate transformation and transmit the flow, that I may aid in shaping the earthly blessings. May the fast’s merit be perfected, and the imperial grace flow forth.

With utmost urgency and overwhelming emotion, I humbly present this memorial to make known my plea. I, your servant, with awe and trepidation, bow my head and knock my forehead, reverently submitting these words.

May he resume his office, his qi entering the Mysterious Mystery, attaining rank and perfection, forever freed from the cycle of rebirth.

Moreover, I pray that the true spirits and deities of [Mountain Name] under [Peak Name], along with the Nine Earth Officials, each within their jurisdictions, protect my late master’s corporeal form. May disasters be averted, his tomb remain tranquil, his form secure, his spirit guarded, and his po never rise. May they hold the tally and match the talisman, reviving his bones and flesh, uniting form and spirit. May he roam and ascend, attaining immortality, fully in accordance with the *Five Transmutations for Liberating the Corpse to Generate Immortality*. May he forever uphold the mysterious grace as a token of gratitude.

With reverence, I contemplate the boundless Dao, beseeching its compassion.

The humble servant, with utmost reverence, prostrates twice to make this solemn report. The concluding rites follow the precedent of the *Chapter on Delivering the Immortal Soul Beyond the Mundane*, as follows:

Your servant, [Name], in trepidation and awe, bows his head to the ground, prostrates again, and respectfully submits: though unworthy, I stand in the ranks of the martial and have presumptuously assumed the office of salvation, undeservedly granted grace beyond my station, humbled by the knowledge of my own limitations. I vow to magnify the benevolence of the Cavernous Assistance and secretly aid the virtue of creation and transformation. I humbly beseech the vast generative power to look down upon my sincere devotion.

In accordance with the intent of this fast, my duty as a master of the teachings permits no refusal. I deeply reflect that [Name], by fortunate karmic affinity, has received the shelter of the mysterious shade, worn the registers, upheld the laws, studied the scriptures, and learned the truths. Yet, entangled in the dusty world, he has not grasped the subtleties of the esoteric. In establishing fasts and setting forth offerings, he has often transgressed against dignity; in bowing to present petitions and memorials, he has truly failed in propriety. Breaking fasts and violating precepts, indulging in karma and following his desires, he has frequently lost harmony with Heaven and often succumbed to human cravings. On the Three Primes and Five La, he has not diligently attended the morning audience of the perfected; on the days of Jiazi and Gengshen, he has never performed repentance or offered thanks. His transgressions are recorded in the Black Register, his name listed in the offices of the mysterious. He has not achieved liberation while seated nor forgotten the self to ascend in spirit. Directing qi and performing the rites for extinction, his body has passed through the Great Yin, his rise or fall unknowable, swiftly enduring months and fortnights.

The filial son says: Your servant’s bond as father and child runs deep, his heart overwhelmed with grief and dread.
The disciple says: Your servant’s duty as teacher and friend is profound, his heart overwhelmed with grief and dread.

Were it not for the compassion of the Most High Sages and the protection of the exalted perfected, who might look down in pity upon our ignorance and mightily grant their covering grace, how could his past transgressions be cleansed and new blessings be guided and welcomed? Therefore, not measuring my own presumption, I humbly present this memorial, one document, to report to the Three Heavens. I prostrate in hope that the great compassion will bend to perfect, the utmost benevolence extend without limit, and a special edict be issued, dispatched to the ten directions, the three realms, and all relevant jurisdictions, to pardon all transgressions of [Name] since the beginning of kalpas and after his birth. May he be transferred to the Azure Palace of the Registers of Destiny, his name moved to the Vermilion Mansion, his form and spirit harmoniously merged, his qi and appearance perfectly rounded. Following the merit of my teachings, may his achievements be assessed and rewards bestowed, his office restored, his qi entering the Mysterious Mystery. May he become a saintly lord of the Golden Towers.

May your servant greatly propagate the sagely transformation, the karmic fortune unbroken, and attain the body of an immortal, roaming carefree in the Highest Clarity, forever freed from the cycle of rebirth. With reverence, I contemplate the boundless Dao, beseeching its compassion.

Your Majesty of the Three Heavens,

With utmost reverence, your servant prostrates and bows twice to present this humble petition through the void-pacing messengers. The conclusion follows the precedent of the *Petition to Sever Karmic Entanglements*. Your subject, [Name], in trembling awe, kowtows and bows again to submit:

By nature dull and ignorant, my talents meager, I yet stand in the ranks of the ordained, vowing to deliver all beings through the extension of boundless compassion. How dare I neglect to report those who seek refuge under my care?

In accordance with the intent of this ritual, I humbly observe that the aforementioned departed soul, throughout its earthly existence, indulged in karmic transgressions without restraint or self-discipline. After departing this world, it bears the weight of accumulated offenses, sinking into the depths of suffering. Drifting through the Three Wretched Realms, tossed amid the Five Afflictions, it clings to its attachments, never aspiring to transcendence. Its kin and relatives all suffer contagion; its household, young and old, faces ruin. Seeking a substitute proves impossible, and so the cycle of karmic entanglement continues unbroken. Such profound suffering truly merits compassion. Without the salvific power of the Mysterious Dao, how could this benighted soul attain peace?

I respectfully present this petition to the Three Heavens, beseeching Your boundless compassion to bestow special grace. May the qi of the Jade Clarity and the wondrous radiance of the Numinous Treasure illuminate the Nine Springs and brighten the dark tombs. May the departed [Name] awaken to right mindfulness, repent of past causes, and recognize former errors, thereby seeking ascent. May its lingering entanglements be severed forever, sparing further affliction.

I humbly invoke the following divine hosts to descend:
- **Shi’an Jun**, **Du Xing Jun**, **Zhu Yang Jun**, **Du Ping Jun**, **Shuo Ping Jun**, **Tian Xuan Jun**, **Shi Xian Jun**, **Gao Du Jun**, **Duan [ ] Jun**, and **Hui Hua Jun** (ten in total);
- **Tian Yi Bo Shi** and **Shan Tan Da Fu** (one each);
- **Officers and generals**, 120 each;
- **Chu Yang Jun**, **Tian Chang Jun**, **Yuan Shang Gao Cang Jun**, and **Zhong Guan Zuo Du Hou Jun** (one each), with **soldiers**, 10,000 each;
- **Su Che Bai Ma Jun** (one), with **clerks and soldiers**, 100,000;
- **Can Xing Jiang Jun**, **Tai Bai Bing Xing Ying Huo Li**, **Tie Mian Gan Jian Shi Gui Li Shi**, **Tian Zou Jia Zu**, and **clerks, soldiers, officers, and generals**—may they all descend together to exhort the departed on behalf of the ritual sponsor [Name], resolving tomb disputes, dissolving all attachments, and severing karmic entanglements.

I further invoke:
- **Duan Zhu Da Jiang Jun** and **Duan Shi Da Jiang Jun** (one each), with **officers, generals, and soldiers**, 100,000;
- **Jiu Tian Bu Qi Jiang**, **Gan Lu Jiang**, and **Hu Ming Jiang** (one each), with **officers and generals**, 32 each—may they descend together to safeguard against future illness and suffering, severing the karmic entanglements of the departed. May [Name]’s form and soul find ease, the tomb remain undisturbed, and all summons or disputes be effortlessly resolved. May sins be absolved, and the soul ascend to transcendence, forever escaping the darkness of the netherworld.

May the ritual sponsor [Name], along with all kin, relatives, and household members, rejoice in carefree bliss, forever freed from contagion. May their spirits be at peace, their vital forces harmonized, and may they enjoy wealth, longevity, health, and tranquility as a sign of this covenant.

With reverence, I contemplate the boundless Dao and humbly beseech its compassion. Your servant prostrates and bows twice again.

Hearing the empty passage, the closing formula follows as before. Commencing the "Proclamation to the Mysterious Vault" chapter:

I, your humble servant [Name], in trepidation and reverence, bow my head to the ground, prostrate myself, and bow twice again in supplication. I, undeserving, have received the profound grace of the Dao, presumptuously assuming the ranks of the true, looking up to its nurturing transformation and bearing deep gratitude below. I aspire to extend the boundless generosity of the ever-generating Way and humbly aid the profound benevolence of its ceaseless transformation. My entreaties have been earnest, and I dare not delay in making this report.

In accordance with the intent of the ritual, I, your servant, deeply consider the site where the altar is to be erected. Since the ashes of kalpas past, yin impurities have congealed, wandering miasmas have sealed the four directions, dust and haze have flowed and settled, and murky filth has flown and spread. Without the power of purification and release, how can the veneration of the mysterious and true be made solemn? Moreover, with residual qi intermingling and beings flourishing in profusion, it is fitting to dissolve and cleanse, that purity may be wholly preserved.

I respectfully present this memorial, one document, to be heard by the Three Heavens. Humbly I beseech that great compassion be bestowed with grace, that the transformative power of the Dao descend in particular. May the qi of the Jade Purity and the wondrous radiance of the Numinous Treasure illumine above the clouds and mists, and shine below upon the wind-formed ramparts, so that the ten flowers and eight extremities are all pervaded with luminous clarity. May the ritual altar thus established be bathed in numinous light, not a speck of dust remaining, its interior and exterior fused in purity, sacred mushrooms spontaneously growing.

I respectfully invoke the descent of the Lords of Purification from the Five Directions and Five Emperors, each one, along with 120 official generals, bearing the Five Harmonies Fragrant Springs and the true essence of dharma-water, to descend together, washing and purifying the numinous altar, dissolving and removing all defilements and impurities.

One thousand two hundred Jade Maidens of Immortal Flowers, along with the Nine Phoenixes from the *Lu of Breaking Impurities*, and the Great Generals of Transporting Impurities, Resolving Impurities, Gathering Impurities, Repelling Impurities, Eliminating Impurities, Severing Impurities, Washing Impurities, and Sweeping Impurities—one from each category—together with 120 official generals each, and the Water-Mastering Dragon Lords of the Five Directions, descend as one to cleanse and purify all implements, vessels, and structures prepared for the ritual, so that halls and dwellings may all attain clarity, utterly free of residual defilement.

Furthermore, I invoke the descent of the Talisman Clerks of Descending Perfection and Summoning Spirits, and the Youths of Descending Perfection and Summoning Spirits, each one, bearing the *Highest Perfected Jade Purity King of Descending Perfection Talismanic Mandate* and the *Primal August Summoning Spirits Talismanic Mandate*, to proclaim to the Three Realms, whistle forth commands to the Ten Directions, dispatch and employ the thousand spirits, and ally with the ten thousand sages, safeguarding the altar’s precepts and rectifying the ritual’s efficacy from beginning to end, that no obstacles or hindrances arise.

May it further be decreed that the command be issued to the Mysterious Altar to receive its charge, and to the offices, bureaus, courts, and departments of the Numinous Treasure Immortal Administration, along with their lords, generals, and clerks, to descend in accordance with the servant’s invocation, jointly aiding the great rectification. Thus may the ritual sponsor [Name]’s virtuous fruits be fully realized, auspicious omens secretly bestowed, the grace received today flowing into future lives. When the altar is dispersed and the merits declared, may the covenant not be betrayed.

With reverence, I contemplate the boundless Dao and humbly beseech its compassion. Your servant prostrates and bows twice again.

Hearing the empty passage, the closing formula follows as before.
Here ends the *Middle Fascicle of Memorials to the Three Caverns*.
Here begins the *Lower Fascicle of Memorials to the Three Caverns*.

Memorial for the Refinement and Salvation of the Nine Heavens

Your subordinate [Name], in utmost reverence and awe, prostrates and bows twice, respectfully memorializes:

I have heard that the Great Dao, in its primordial division, first expounded the teaching beyond words; the Heavenly Worthy, in spreading transformation, gradually bestowed the scriptures of creation. Universally delivering all beings, it encompasses the myriad dharmas. With utmost reverence and awe, I prostrate and bow twice again.

Reflecting humbly, I, unworthy and base, have presumptuously ascended the immortal ranks, receiving and upholding the teachings and precepts, following the wondrous canon. I have elucidated the primordial model of the First Azure and disseminated the precious chapters of the Cavernous Mystery. I have sworn to take the deliverance of the dead as my heart and pledged the salvation of the living as my vow. Having been cleansed by the earnestness of my supplication, I now venture to extend my private entreaty.

Your subordinate, in accordance with the sponsor’s intent and reverently consulting the mysterious texts, shall perform the refinement and salvation. Without the compassionate aid of the exalted perfected, how could the drowned and lost be universally saved? Thus, I pour forth my sincerity and presumptuously appeal to the celestial audience.

I reverently contemplate the Most Supreme Heavenly Worthy of Primordial Unity and Salvation, whose sageliness and benevolence are boundless, whose compassion and solicitude are utmost. Mounting the immortal chariot of the Nine Masters, you scatter the auspicious radiance of the hundred treasures. Guiding and uplifting the floating lives, you do not violate your original vow. I humbly beseech that the true talismans be issued and that your beneficent grace widely bestow its moisture.

Pouring sweet dew upon the fiery mountain, it transforms into refreshing coolness; fanning the divine wind upon the sword trees, they change into towering forests. Thus may the souls undergoing refinement ascend to the cavernous halls of yang, attain the ranks of perfected immortals, and augment blessings for humans and heavens. May the lonely souls of the six paths be universally aided, and all escape the bitter destinies of the three realms. Above, I pray for the great creation; below, I fulfill the sincere devotion of my heart. I, your servant, can scarcely contain my reverence as I gaze toward the heavens and long for the sagely presence, overwhelmed with earnest trepidation.

With utmost awe and fear, I bow my head and prostrate myself, respectfully submitting this memorial for your attention.

[Date] [Rank and Name of the Memorialist]

---

The subsequent eight memorials share the same opening and closing as above, differing only in their central sections.

---

I reverently contemplate the Most Exalted Heavenly Worthies of the Ten Directions and Salvation, whose majesty and power extend boundlessly, whose wisdom and insight are perfectly all-encompassing. Responding to a single thought, you deliver the depths of the Yellow Springs; filling the ten directions, you uplift the shades of the departed. The four kinds of birth receive your grace; the six paths hold your kindness in gratitude. I humbly beseech that your vast compassion be specially bestowed, your benevolent grace widely proclaimed, and that this be memorialized to the Primordial Supreme Emperor. May the Jade Lads of the Great One be dispatched to open the *Purple Yang Jade Summit* scriptures and reveal the talismanic writings of *phoenix-qi* and *dragon-script*. Universally bestow upon all, widely deliver the boundless. May the Dharma rain moisten and soak, dissolving transgressions and sins; may the auspicious mist thicken and flourish, halting grievances and enmities. Together, by the merit of refinement and salvation, may all attain the joy of carefree wandering.

---

I reverently contemplate the Most Exalted Heavenly Worthy of the Nine Dark Realms and Deliverance from Sin, whose perfected radiance refines the upper realms and whose power to deliver suffering reaches the depths below. Releasing the unimpeded divine light, you illuminate the great thousandfold worlds. Your mysterious grace broadly covers all; at dawn, all awaken. I humbly beseech that jade talismans be issued, opening the iron citadel to deliver the condemned; that the black ledgers be burned away, extinguishing the fire’s haze and ending bitterness. Thus may the departed have all myriad evils dissolved and the six senses purified. May their shadows escape the nine yin domains, their souls ascend to the heavens of the three *qi*. Forever parted from the paths of delusion, may all ascend the road of life.

---

I reverently contemplate the Most Exalted Heavenly Worthy of the Vermilion Mound and Deliverance of Lives, whose august presence crowns the Vermilion Palace and whose Dao governs the cinnabar realms. You expound compassion to save all beings and extend benevolence to deliver humanity. I humbly hope that your vast compassion be deeply moved, that talismanic decrees be issued. Those not yet delivered, may they all ride the merit of refinement and salvation; those not yet reborn, may they all attain the wondrousness of renewal. Forever parting from the earthly prisons, may they ascend directly to the heavenly halls.

---

I reverently contemplate...

I reverently contemplate the Most Exalted Heavenly Worthy of the Cinnabar Realm and Fire Refinement, whose Dao crowns the Southern Palace and who governs as the Red Emperor. You wield the wondrous power of molten gold, transforming withered bones into living beings. In every place, You respond to the moment; in every direction, You establish transformation. Humbly I beseech that Your divine radiance blaze forth, refining the corpse-spirits to be reborn; that Your dharmic power shine brightly, delivering the hidden souls to restore their lives. Below, may they escape the Northern Capital’s courts; above, may they ascend to the Southern Pole’s heavens. Extending to the Nine Springs, may they forever part from the Five Sufferings.

I reverently contemplate the Most Exalted Heavenly Worthy of the Great Bridge of Salvation, whose boundless virtue cherishes life and whose perfect benevolence embraces all beings. You spread the ladder and ferry across the sea of suffering, delivering all kinds from the ford of delusion. From ancient times to the present, You grasp the sun and moon. Humbly I beseech that Your precious banner extend its reach, opening a path through the hidden darkness; that the true *qi* flow downward, unfurling a rainbow across the sky. May You guide these departed ones to ascend to that heaven. Release them from the transgressions of past errors, and let them realize today the fruit of their alliance with the true. May the suffering souls of the Yellow Springs all attain freedom.

I reverently contemplate the Most Exalted Heavenly Worthy of the Golden Portal’s Incarnation, whose body is the Dao and who responds to the primordial. You bear myriad names across infinite kalpas, traversing the causes and conditions of vast eons. Universally nurturing all beings, You broadly open the gate of eternal goodness.

Humbly I beseech You to bestow Your grace and examine their plight, rescuing the souls of the Three Wretched Realms from myriad deaths; to absolve their sins and erase their transgressions, that they may ascend the Ninefold Refinement’s path of rebirth. From lower grades to higher grades, may they swiftly escape the wheel of retribution; from action-bound existence to the realm of non-action, may they ever dwell in purity and order.

I further pray that Your benevolence extend universally, reaching as countless as the sands of the river.

Reverently contemplating the Most Exalted Heavenly Worthy of Joyous Freedom, whose body embodies the Dao at the dawn of transformation, whose spirit condenses beyond all things. You transcend the subtlest of subtleties, abiding serenely in the highest of heavens. Your merit pervades the hidden darkness, Your grace blankets the cycles of life and death. Humbly I beseech You to illumine the sun and moon, to ride the winds and clouds, delivering these departed souls from their evil destinies. May they rejoice in the realm of eternal spring, wander freely in the land of endless day. May the karmic kin of countless kalpas all attain liberation at once.

Reverently contemplating the Most Exalted Heavenly Worthy of Perfect Floral Brilliance, whose merit fulfills the Six Perfections, whose Dao realizes the Three Vehicles. Your countenance is majestic and dignified, Your blessings and wisdom complete. Only through utmost sincerity may one move You; truly Your vast salvation knows no bounds. Humbly I beseech You to bend Your compassionate mercy, to broadly extend skillful means, that heavenly light may shine below and the earthly prisons be opened. May the departed consciousness transcend mortality, relying on the merit of this fast to attain higher grades. May they be nurtured in the Hall of Radiant Yang, ascending to the Court of Great Possession. I further pray that Your remaining blessings subtly support their descendants.

The resplendent talismans of the Nine Heavens’ Emperors are appended below.

Your humble servant, [Name], bows reverently and respectfully submits this memorial:

I humbly observe that the Two Modes nurture all beings, and the thousand truths all converge in the Three Fields; that the Nine *qi* gather to form the body, and the ten thousand images array themselves in the Six Repositories. When the hundred meridians are harmonious and flowing, the seven apertures open unimpeded, the *po* is tranquil, the *hun* is serene, the spirit is clear, and the *qi* is refreshed. I now, on behalf of the disciples of [Place], present this altar petition, beseeching on behalf of the deceased [Name] to release their grievances, absolve their sins, wash away their filth, and purify their dust, that they may awaken to their original source and distinguish purity from impurity.

We, Your servants, have performed the fast and practiced the Dao, issuing talismans and decrees to extinguish sins, break through the darkness, transmit talismans, and confer precepts. We grant the register of the local Heavenly Court, bestow the talisman for transcending life and death, and make offerings to the ten directions, invoking the assembly of sages.

Yet I still fear that the departed soul, having committed sins in life and accumulated transgressions in death, may have sunk into evil destinies or risk falling into the wheel of rebirth—transforming their form and changing their body, never again to regain human form. I, having received from my master the Ninefold Refinement talismans, am permitted to deliver the sunken and lost. Diligently following the ritual codes, I reverently invoke the Primordial Harmonious Wondrous *qi* to entwine the deceased soul, that they may inwardly glow and outwardly shine, their essence harmonizing with heaven and earth, once more attaining human or heavenly rebirth and attending the court of the Most High.

May they, by the day, undergo refinement, and by the hour, ascend in rank. I respectfully submit this memorial, addressing the Emperor of the Boundless Joyous Heaven. Humbly I await Your heavenly compassion, that You may deign to grant this petition, uphold the talismanic decree, and specially bestow the Primordial Yellow Effulgent *qi*, coiling ninefold around their spiritual womb, that the womb-origin of the deceased [Name] may be unobstructed, ascending to heaven for regeneration, and thus regain the path of human life.

I am overwhelmed with awe and trepidation. Reverently bowing twice, I respectfully submit this memorial. The subsequent eight memorials follow the same form, only changing the names of the deities addressed.

To the Most Supreme Meditative and Virtuous Emperor of the Boundless Longevity Heaven,
may You specially bestow the ninefold-coiling *qi* of the Purple Portal of Profound Obscurity,
that the fetal knots of the deceased [Name] may dissolve, their root be made whole in body,
and they regain the path of human life.

To the Emperor of the Heavenly Watch of Brahmā’s Extension,
may You specially bestow the ninefold-coiling *qi* of the Luminous Immortals of Enduring Spirit,
that the soul-gate of the deceased [Name] may be refined by immortality to circulate essence,
and they regain a human form.

To the Emperor of the Heaven of Silent and Wondrous Arts,
may You specially bestow the ninefold-coiling *qi* of the Radiant Corpse’s Profound Effulgence,
that the corporeal gate of the deceased [Name] may descend immortality to attain tranquility,
and they regain a human form.

To the Emperor of the Heaven of Joyous Non-Arrogance of Pāramitā,
may You specially bestow the ninefold-coiling *qi* of the Central Spirit of the Five Immortals,
that the five viscera of the deceased [Name] may be cleansed and cooled to preserve spirit,
and they regain a human form.

To the Emperor of the Heaven of Resonant Transformation of the Profound Mystery,
may You specially bestow the ninefold-coiling *qi* of the Soaring Perfected in Harmonious Fusion,
that the six bowels of the deceased [Name] may be opened and flourishing, their gastric tube generating fluids,
and they regain a human form.

To the Emperor of the Heaven of Numinous Transformation and Brahmā’s Assistance,
may You specially bestow the ninefold-coiling *qi* of the Lofty Immortals of the Profound Canon,
that the orifices of the deceased [Name] may be opened to keen perception, their stellar lodges bright and clear to circulate spirit,
and they regain a human form.

To the Emperor of the Heaven of Lofty Emptiness and Luminous Purity,
may You specially bestow the ninefold-coiling *qi* of the True Spirit’s Transformative Coagulation,
that the three divisions and eight landscapes of the deceased [Name] may be ordered, their form and spirit made whole to preserve perfection,
and they regain a human form.

To the Emperor of the Heaven of No-Thought, No-Knots, and No-Sorrow,
may You specially bestow the ninefold-coiling *qi* of the Spontaneous and Mystically Illuminating,
that the three barriers and five viscera of the deceased [Name], their joints and root-source, may in their original beginning all at once be filled with the *qi* of life-generating spirit, their voice ever invoking spirit, their hair and body fully regenerated.

The Lower Scroll of the Memorials to the Three Caverns of the Most High is now complete.

chunks.original_text: 太上三洞表文 经名：太上三洞表文。 三卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞神部表奏类。 太上三洞表文卷上 通天救苦朱表 具位臣某诚惶诚恐，稽首顿首，再拜 上言，臣尘土微资，草茅贱质，偶缘宿庆，叨沐恩光，佩箓进阶，传经受道，希夷莫悟，愚钝自将，过有渊陵，功无铢黍，曲承涵育，未赐诛夷，济物度人，上酬奖遇。 臣谨据斋意。 臣切虑泉曲罗酆，三官九署，铁围无间，积夜重阴，羁考罪魂，终天莫释。 自非归神苍极，请命青华，普轸慈悲。 曷由出离，来朝玄陛，受炼更生，庸是不揆。 斐愚谨为拜表一通，上闻青宫，伏望慧力矜怜，威神垂轸，特降青玄妙炁，百宝光明，披朗重阴，开明长夜，天上天下，无不照耀。 即使亡过某超凌幽暗，证妙虚无，释罪原情，飞登金阙。 臣谨为上请青玄救苦童子、救苦玉女、九龙符命使者，上诣东极长乐宫，玉陛下请降东华九龙符命，告下十方无极神乡、冥路幽关、应干考禁去处，为亡某疾除罪簿，落灭恶根，部卫形魂，应时解脱。 又为上请青玄黄箓破狱灵官、破狱主吏、持符神吏、命符飞龙驿吏，一合下降，敕破幽牢，啸命冥吏，即使火山息焰，冰池静波，剑变骞林，刀化玉树，地狱摧毁，铁城开宣，放遣亡灵，出离苦恼，来亲坛陛，睹见光明。 又为上请太乙真光引魂仙吏、赤光三炁化魂灵官、六道寻魂使者、夜光召魂判吏、急速飞云灵官，一合下降，追摄亡过某真魂正魄，克返阳居，沐浴更衣，朝真受食。 又为上请朱陵火府南昌上宫炼度真司、黄华玉女童子、水火将军，一合下降，专为亡过某荡涤尘秽，陶冶业氛，表裹洞明，形神清净。 又为上请通和玄灵玉女、左右崇正灵官、领魂录功飞云正吏、玉清察符仙吏、飞云通游移籍灵官，一合下降，特为亡过某详辩监察，保举合生，纪录善功，领魂超迈，移割鬼籍，注入仙曹，永为种民，无有输转。 又为上请仙魂逍遥快乐自然清净仙吏、专度曲度太玄灵官、玉女功曹、主簿大神，引领亡过某度上太一玄生之府，朝谒莲座，游宴妙严，身生玉光，衣食自在，更冀祥烟塞死，庆云开生。 五苦三涂，均证无为之果； 四生六道，疾超有漏之乡。

**Supreme Petition of the Three Caverns**

**Scripture Title:** *Supreme Petition of the Three Caverns*
Three fascicles.
Source text: *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, Cavern Spirit Section, Petitions and Memorials category.

**Fascicle One of the Supreme Petition of the Three Caverns**

**Vermilion Memorial for Universal Salvation and Deliverance from Suffering**

Your humble servant, [Name], of lowly rank, with utmost reverence and trepidation, prostrates and bows twice, respectfully addressing the throne:

This unworthy servant, a speck of dust and blade of grass, by mere fortune of past blessings, has been graced with favor and light, granted registers and promotions, transmitted scriptures and received the Dao. Yet I remain dull and ignorant, my faults deep as abysses, my merits lighter than a mustard seed. Though I have humbly received nurturance, I have not been punished for my transgressions. To repay the grace of salvation and deliver beings, I dare not presume.

Your servant respectfully submits the intent of this retreat.

I deeply fear that in the netherworld’s winding paths, the Three Offices and Nine Bureaus, the Iron Enclosure and the Unrelenting Prison, beneath layers of darkness and dense gloom, the souls of the condemned languish, bound for eternity without release. If they do not return their spirits to the Azure Ultimate and petition the Azure Radiance, invoking universal compassion, how shall they escape? Only by approaching the Mysterious Threshold at dawn to receive refinement and rebirth may this be achieved. Thus, I, foolish though I am, humbly present this memorial to ascend to the Azure Palace, beseeching the power of wisdom and mercy, the might of the divine to bestow grace. May the wondrous *qi* of the Azure Mystery, the radiance of a hundred treasures, pierce the dense gloom, illuminate the endless night, and shine without fail across heaven above and heaven below. May the departed soul [Name] transcend the dark abyss, realize the wondrous emptiness of the void, have sins absolved and transgressions pardoned, and ascend to the Golden Towers.

Your servant respectfully invokes the Azure Mystery’s Youths of Salvation, Jade Maidens of Salvation, and the Envoys of the Nine-Dragon Talismanic Command, to ascend to the Palace of Everlasting Joy in the Eastern Ultimate. At the Jade Steps, may they request the descent of the Nine-Dragon Talismanic Command of the Eastern Florescence, proclaiming it to the boundless divine realms of the ten directions, the shadowy paths and hidden passes, and all places of punishment and confinement. For the departed [Name], may they swiftly expunge the ledgers of sin, eradicate the roots of evil, and guard body and soul, granting immediate liberation.

Furthermore, your servant invokes the Azure Mystery’s Divine Officers of the Yellow Register for Prison-Breaking, the Wardens of Prison-Breaking, the Talisman-Bearing Divine Officers, and the Flying Dragon Couriers of the Talismanic Command, to descend as one. May they issue decrees to shatter the netherworld’s dungeons, command the underworld’s officials, and cause the flames of the Fire Mountain to subside, the waves of the Ice Pool to still, the sword trees to transform into blossoming groves, and the blade forests into jade trees. May the hells crumble, the iron cities open, and the departed spirits be released from torment, drawn to the altar’s steps to behold the light.

Furthermore, your servant invokes the Celestial Officers of the True Light of the Great Unity to Guide Souls, the Divine Officers of the Three *Qi* of Red Light to Transform Souls, the Envoys to Seek Souls across the Six Paths, the Judges of the Night-Shining Summons, and the Swift Flying Cloud Divine Officers, to descend as one. May they pursue and retrieve the true soul and correct spirit of the departed [Name], returning them to the yang realm, where they may bathe, change garments, pay homage to the perfected, and receive sustenance.

Furthermore, your servant invokes the True Bureau of Refinement and Salvation of the Southern Prosperity Palace of the Vermilion Mound Fire Treasury, the Jade Maidens and Youths of the Yellow Florescence, and the Generals of Water and Fire, to descend as one. May they specially refine and purge the departed [Name], scouring away worldly filth, tempering karmic miasmas, illuminating within and without, and purifying body and spirit.

Furthermore, your servant invokes the Jade Maidens of Harmonious Mystery and Numinous Radiance, the Divine Officers of Left and Right Upholding Rectitude, the Flying Cloud Officers of Soul-Recording and Merit-Registering, the Jade Clarity Inspectors of Talismanic Verification, and the Flying Cloud Divine Officers of Transcendent Travel and Register-Shifting, to descend as one. May they specially examine and oversee the departed [Name], ensuring just assessment, recommending rebirth, recording meritorious deeds, guiding the soul to transcendence, excising their name from the ghostly registers, and inscribing it in the celestial bureaus, that they may forever dwell as a seed of immortality, free from further cycles.

Furthermore, your servant invokes the Celestial Officers of the Free and Joyous Wandering Souls, the Divine Officers of the Mysterious Salvation of the Crooked and Perverse, the Jade Maidens of Merit and Achievement, and the Great Gods of the Registry, to lead the departed [Name] to ascend to the Palace of the Mysterious Life of the Great Unity. May they pay homage at the Lotus Throne, wander and feast in wondrous splendor, their bodies suffused with jade light, their clothing and nourishment self-sustaining. May auspicious mists dispel death, and propitious clouds usher forth life.

May the Five Sufferings and Three Paths all realize the fruit of non-action; may the Four Births and Six Destinies swiftly transcend the realm of defilement.

chunks.original_text: 率土普天，咸沾利益，恩惟慈造，愿察翘倾。 臣愚谨因青玄玉女、青玄功曹、四直玉文功曹、运神会道功曹、十方飞天使者，各一人出操。 臣为某拜上通天救苦朱表一通，上诣束极门下。 伏愿天恩告报，臣诚惶诚恐，稽首顿首，再拜以闻。 臣姓某属某州县某宫观靖焚修东极天中，长乐宫内，大慈仁者，寻声赴感 太一救苦天尊玉陛下。 太岁  年  月  日於某处拜上 东极表 具位臣某诚惶诚恐，稽首顿首，再拜 上言，今月某日为修斋弟子某崇建青玄救苦妙斋几昼夜，开度亡过某灵魂。 谨具表奏陈者。 伏以赤明开图，爱日周流於六合； 青玄御运，祥烟郁勃於九幽。 昭回白玉之光，洞焕紫金之相。 寻声赴感，应念垂慈，惟拔领以无方，故皈依而有请。 臣诚惶诚恐，稽首顿首，伏念亡过某灵魂留连世网，涉历尘机。 欲海千寻，每泛狂澜而飘荡； 爱河万仞，莫排浊浪以流吹。 精神陷溺於一朝，步武沉沦於九夜。 铜关检击，铁垒周遭。 寂寂衔哀，徒羡求生之有路； 皇皇茹苦，顿惊救死之无门。 自非归命於青华，曷俾神超於黄混。 恭惟 东极天中，长乐宫内，大慈仁者，寻声赴感太一救苦天尊玉陛下。 威神徧满，慧力周回。 七宝骞林，洒辉辉之甘露； 九色莲座，敷奕奕之慈云。 真光覆徧於大千，瑞炁咸舒於百亿。 凡居陶冶，亶藉提携。 伏愿圣德昭彰，灵威浩荡，勅九司之仙吏，制地承符； 宣二府之真曹，宪天弘道。 为纪善功於丹简，即销恶障於玄编。 庶俾亡过某魂，眇眇乘晨，匆匆离夜。 绝地狱热恼之苦，永断黑酆； 享天堂清净之欢，径跻朱火。 步武快登於妙有，形神疾证於虚无。 臣下情无任激切之至，谨奉表奏，以闻谨言。 年　月　日具位臣姓某上表 又 具位臣某再拜

May the blessings of earth and heaven universally bestow their benefits, and may Your boundless compassion deign to regard our earnest plea.

Your humble servant respectfully invokes the Azure Mystery Jade Maidens, the Azure Mystery Merit Officers, the Four Direct Jade Script Officers, the Divine Assembly Officers of the Dao, and the Flying Celestial Envoys of the Ten Directions—each to attend in their singular authority.

On behalf of [Name], your servant humbly presents a vermilion memorial of salvation to the Heavenly Gate of the Eastern Culmen. May the celestial grace respond in kind. With reverence and awe, your servant bows his head to the ground, prostrates himself, and respectfully submits this entreaty.

Your servant, [Your Name], of [Your Prefecture, County, and Abbey], presently engaged in the purification rites at the Palace of Everlasting Joy within the Heavenly Center of the Eastern Culmen, addresses the Most Merciful and Compassionate, the Ever-Responsive, the Great Unity Savior from Suffering, the Jade August One.

In the [Year] of the Great Year Star, on the [Day] of the [Month], at [Location], your servant, with utmost reverence, prostrates himself and submits this Eastern Culmen Memorial.

This month, on the [Day], for the pious disciple [Name] who has established the Azure Mystery Wondrous Fast of Salvation from Suffering for [Number] days and nights, to deliver the soul of the departed [Name], your servant respectfully presents this memorial.

It is humbly observed that when the Vermilion Radiance unfolded the cosmic chart, the loving sun circulated through the Six Directions; when the Azure Mystery governed the turning of the ages, auspicious mists flourished in the Nine Netherworlds. The luminous white jade light shines forth, and the resplendent purple-golden form illumines all. Ever-responsive to cries for aid, ever-compassionate to those who invoke, Your boundless deliverance knows no limit, and thus we turn in devotion and make our plea.

With reverence and awe, your servant bows his head to the ground, reflecting upon the soul of the departed [Name], lingering in the snares of the worldly net, traversing the mechanisms of dust. In the thousand-fathom sea of desire, they drift upon wild waves; in the ten-thousand-ren river of attachment, they cannot escape the surging currents. Their spirit drowned in a single moment, their steps sank into the ninefold night. The copper gates clang shut, the iron ramparts enclose all around. In silent sorrow, they vainly long for a path to life; in frantic anguish, they suddenly realize there is no gate to salvation from death. Had they not turned their lives toward the Azure Flower, how could their souls ascend beyond the Yellow Turbidity?

We reverently invoke the Heavenly Center of the Eastern Culmen, the Palace of Everlasting Joy, the Most Merciful and Compassionate, the Ever-Responsive, the Great Unity Savior from Suffering, the Jade August One. Your majestic power pervades all, Your wisdom and strength encompass the universe. In the seven-jeweled forest of towering trees, You pour forth the radiant sweet dew; upon the nine-hued lotus throne, You spread the resplendent clouds of compassion. Your true light blankets the great thousand worlds, and Your auspicious qi unfurls across the hundred millions. All who dwell within Your transforming influence are surely uplifted and guided.

May Your sagely virtue shine forth, and Your divine might surge boundlessly. Command the immortal officers of the Nine Bureaus to govern the earth and uphold the celestial decrees; proclaim the true officers of the Two Courts to manifest the Dao and magnify the heavenly principles. Record their merits upon the cinnabar tablets, and instantly dissolve their karmic obstructions from the mysterious registers. Thus may the soul of the departed [Name], swiftly mounting the dawn, hastily depart the night. May they forever escape the scorching agonies of hell and sever all ties to the Dark Feng; may they enjoy the pure bliss of heaven and swiftly ascend the Vermilion Fire. May their steps swiftly ascend to the wondrous existence, and may their form and spirit swiftly realize the realm of emptiness.

Your servant’s heart is overwhelmed with fervent devotion. Respectfully presenting this memorial, he submits it with utmost sincerity.

On the [Day] of the [Month] of the [Year], your servant [Your Name], prostrating himself, respectfully submits this memorial.

Again, your servant [Your Name] bows in reverence.

To the Throne,

On the [Day] of this month, your disciple [Name], in reverence, has conducted the Mystic Fast of Salvation under the Azure Mystery for several days and nights, to deliver the departed soul of [Name]. With this memorial, your servant humbly submits his report.

We reflect that when the Azure Mystery opens its court, propitious clouds ascend with the radiance of the Three Poles; when the Yellow Register establishes its palace, flying mists scatter their hues to the eight directions. The sun of wisdom shines forth from the Lion’s Throne, and the divine wind blazes in the Dragon’s script. Thus, clutching this vermilion petition, I raise this plain silk in supplication.

Your servant, trembling with awe, bows his head and knocks his forehead to the ground, mindful of his fortune to ride this luminous destiny and partake in this flourishing era. Upholding the Dao and enacting heaven’s decrees, he follows in the footsteps of the exalted; receiving the mandate and proclaiming virtue, he clasps the lotus throne to attend upon your countenance. Having received the grace of nurture, how dare he not repay the blessings of cultivation?

Reverently considering the Most Compassionate One of the Eastern Pole, within the Palace of Eternal Joy—the Supreme Unity, Savior from Suffering, Heavenly Worthy of Jade Majesty—who sits in sublime majesty, eternally serene. Responding to thoughts with mercy, he scatters auspicious mist at the gates of death; answering cries with compassion, he showers sweet dew upon the portals of life. Universally, he delivers those sunk in darkness, all drawn to his salvific guidance.

May the departed soul swiftly depart the night and hasten into the dawn; may the dark gloom be erased from the registers, dissolving the illusory shadows of the great chiliocosm; may the Azure Florescence fix their name in the ledgers, and may they ride the true light of the Supreme Unity. Forever may they attend the Purple Gold, ascending to the heights of Jasper Jade.

Your servant’s heart is overwhelmed with fervent devotion. Respectfully presenting this memorial, he submits it with utmost sincerity.

On the [Day] of the [Month] of the [Year], your servant [Your Name], prostrating himself, respectfully submits this *Memorial for Breaking the Prisons of Hell*.

Again, your servant [Your Name] bows in reverence.

To the August Jade Sovereign,

On the [Day] of this month, your disciple [Name], in devotion, has established the Mystic Fast of Azure Florescence and Salvific Grace, spanning several days and nights, to deliver the departed soul of [Name], now invoking the ritual forms to break the prisons of hell and summon the wandering spirit.

Your servant prostrates himself, reflecting: as one ascends to the true and delivers the destined, the Azure Florescence congeals the limpid dew; as shackles are shattered and gates flung wide, auspicious mists disperse through the gloom. Daring to knock upon the sacred portal of compassion, I implore the spreading of salvific mercy. With a hundred bows I lay bare my plea, with a single heart I beseech your decree.

Truly trembling in awe, I kowtow and prostrate myself, deeply concerned that in the frigid courts the lingering souls stagnate, in the abyssal ravines the forsaken spirits languish. Iron ramparts encircle them, enduring ten thousand kalpas of fettered suffering; copper gates blaze with radiance, bearing a thousand ages of carceral severity. Ghostly officials enforce the laws of yin and yang; netherworld clerks administer punishments of water and fire. Without your edict to break these bonds, how may they ascend and transcend?

Reverently considering the Heavenly Center of the Eastern Ultimate, within the Palace of Eternal Joy, the Greatly Compassionate One, the Supreme Unity Salvific and Suffering-Relieving Heavenly Worthy, August Jade Sovereign—ever responsive to cries, ever aiding with creation—you descend your majestic radiance upon the myriad treasures, parting the layered darkness; you wield the divine staff of the Five Numinous Ones, piercing the accumulated night. May you deign to incline your profound hearing, resplendently bestow your assent, proclaiming the decree in accord with the statutes, secretly aligning with the dragon tally to usher in the dawn; may you, following the rites, shatter the prisons, instantly bringing spring to the kennels of suffering.

Thus may the departed soul of [Name] depart the night without sorrow, ride the dawn with joy. As their luminous splendor blazes forth, the ninefold ramparts gleam bright; as their spirit flies with the sacred staff, the three paths know peace and prosperity. May all in the realms of suffering be uplifted together, attaining the land of bliss.

Your servant’s heart is overwhelmed with fervent devotion. Respectfully presenting this memorial, he submits it with utmost sincerity.

On the [Day] of the [Month] of the [Year], your servant [Your Name], prostrating himself, respectfully submits this *Memorial of Merit for the Azure Florescence*.

chunks.translated_text:
The golden tablets reveal the dragon talismans’ secrets,
The jade charts unfold the phoenix scriptures’ marvels.
The Three Realms restore life,
The Nine Heavens raise the dead.
Bearing radiance to succor the lowly, truly repaying grace;
Overflowing from within, earnestly bowing in repentance.
Humbly imploring Your profound silence,
To bestow pardon with boundless mercy.

Your servant, trembling with awe, kowtows and prostrates himself.
Reflecting upon his own path: a minnow in the rut, a toad in the well—
meager talent, shallow understanding.
Failing to uphold the Azure Precepts,
merely assisting in the Mystic Ranks.
Unversed in the rites of reverence,
his demeanor often transgresses;
still ignorant of the fast’s canons,
he lightly violates the prohibitions.
Presumptuously summoning the divine bureaus,
recklessly filing memorials under his superior’s title.
Words disordered, yet daring to expound the golden codes;
thoughts scattered, yet rashly inscribing jade talismans.
His conduct already marked by error,
he fears his faults and transgressions accumulate.
Earnestly hoping for compassion,
that all may be forgiven with grace.

Reverently considering the August Jade Sovereign of the Eastern Ultimate Azure Florescence,
the Most High Lord of Salvation and Suffering:
Your Dao embraces the Three Realms,
Your virtue surpasses the Ten Splendors.
Upholding the true spirits,
You reward merit with justice;
sustaining the duties of office,
You conceal faults with forbearance.

chunks.original_text: 其有修斋之初，上请天仙兵吏、地仙兵马、真人兵马、神人兵马、日月星宿兵马、三河四海兵马、九宫五帝兵马、三十二天监斋直事、侍香玉童、散花玉女、三五功曹左右官使者、五帝直符直日香官、飞龙骑吏灵宝天仙、内院诸天承受玉女、运神会道功曹、青玄黄箓左右真司仙灵官 吏、九天普度院仙官将吏、玄坛开度混元司、解结司、监生司、天医司、澣濯司、巾笥司、摄化司诸部承宣官吏、本靖侍靖仙官、玉童玉女、主副官将某、护道某、监坛某、主坛某、诸省府院司效职宣劳官君将吏、监临翊卫某庙某神、本州城隍司、本县城隍司、某乡某里里域真官、土地正神、三界符使、四直功曹、斋家土地司命六神，在坛守职，备着勤劳，并各显服严装，随臣所进表文，上诣玄都，列受功赏，臣敢不铭心精进，洁己操修，期毋负於生成，庸恢张於化育。 运元契道，倘成东华合景之功； 领教学真，愿佐南丹受书之化。
